Text:
Dear Mantesh,
how do I message you other than posting comments. TPB doesn't have a Messaging feature.

Anyway, here's what I want - I only discovered that perhaps the world's most popular figure Bill Gates, has authored some amazing books. But I can't find them anywhere.

How to be a Billionaire: Proven Strategies from the Titans of Wealth
The Road Ahead
Bill Gates (Biography (a & E))
Gates: How Microsoft's Mogul Reinvented an Industry and Made Himself The Richest Man in America
Hard Drive: Bill Gates and the Making of the Microsoft Empire
and of course,
Business @ the Speed of Thought.

Lastly, just this year, his buddy Paul Allen, released a book - Idea Man: A Memoir by the Cofounder of Microsoft. ISBN is 1591843820.
Even I can't find this book on TPB, or KickAssTorrents either.

Mantesh, please make these books available, to all of us.

Oprah

Dear Mantesh,

Please stop to use ImageShack.us, from now on.
Since I followed your advice - and registered with it, yet your share covers are not visible. The same message appears as before, irrespective of registration and being signed in to ImageShack.us.

'This domain violates ImageShack's ToS.'

Oprah
